mapper.sql: COUPONHISTORY.ID COUPONHISTORY_ID, COUPONHISTORY.COUPON_ID COUPONHISTORY_COUPONID, COUPONHISTORY.CHARGE COUPONHISTORY_CHARGE, COUPONHISTORY.LAST_MODIFY_TIME COUPONHISTORY_LASTMODIFYTIME, COUPONHISTORY.CREATE_TIME COUPONHISTORY_CREATETIME, COUPONHISTORY.DELETED COUPONHISTORY_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into COUPONHISTORY
COUPON_ID,
CHARGE,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
DELETED,
#{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update COUPONHISTORY
COUPON_ID = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHARGE = #{charge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from COUPONHISTORY where DELETED = 0
